channel.title: themes on GenCloth Website
channel.description: Recent content in themes on GenCloth Website

item.title: Parametric Fashion Blocks/Slopers Database
item.description: Parametric Fashion Blocks/Slopers are sets of master parametric patterns with variable sizing values used to make more detailed patterns.

item.title: Generative Fashion Design Tools
item.description: Generative fashion design tools use transformative algorithms to include data in the design stage optimizing digital fashion design for multiple objectives simultaneously.

item.title: Parametric Design Pattern Database
item.description: Parametric fashion patterns are created using variable values set for design attributes such as silhouette, appliques, necklines, in addition to sizing.

item.title: Generative Garment Design for Circularity
item.description: Generative garment design for circularity utilizes generative algorithms to include lifecycle, material use, and circularity data at the garment design phase, shifting towards a more environmentally conscious fashion industry and radically increasing the adoption of circular design.

item.title: Generative Textile Design Tools
item.description: Generative textile design tools use transformative algorithms to include data in the design stage optimizing digital textile design for multiple objectives simultaneously.
